--- select_expr.sql
select 1 + 2, 1 - 2,
       1 * 2, 2 / 2,
       +1++1, -1+-1,
       +1.2, -3.4,
       ~1 ^ ~1,
       1 ^ 2, 2 & 1, 2 | 1,
       1 << 2, 2 >> 1,
       foo.bar * +foo.bar * -foo.bar,
       (select 1 `1`).1,
       NOT NOT true,
       [1, 2, 3][offset(1)],
       [1, 2, 3][`offset`(1)],
       [1, 2, 3][ordinal(1)],
       case
       when 1 = 1 then "1 = 1"
       else            "else"
       end,
       case 1
       when 1 then "1"
       when 2 then "2"
       else        "other"
       end,
       IF(1 < 2, 2, 1)+1,
       date_add(date "2019-09-01", interval 5 day),
       timestamp_add(timestamp "2019-09-01 08:11:22", interval 5 hour),
       1 in (1, 2, 3),
       2 in unnest([1, 2, 3]),
       3 in (select 1 union all select 2 union all select 3),
       [1] || [2]

--- AST
&ast.QueryStatement{
  Hint:  (*ast.Hint)(nil),
  With:  (*ast.With)(nil),
  Query: &ast.Select{
    Select:   0,
    Distinct: false,
    AsStruct: false,
    Results:  []ast.SelectItem{
      &ast.ExprSelectItem{
        Expr: &ast.BinaryExpr{
          Op:   "+",
          Left: &ast.IntLiteral{
            ValuePos: 7,
            ValueEnd: 8,
            Base:     10,
            Value:    "1",
          },
          Right: &ast.IntLiteral{
            ValuePos: 11,
            ValueEnd: 12,
            Base:     10,
            Value:    "2",
          },
        },
      },
      &ast.ExprSelectItem{
        Expr: &ast.BinaryExpr{
          Op:   "-",
          Left: &ast.IntLiteral{
            ValuePos: 14,
            ValueEnd: 15,
            Base:     10,
            Value:    "1",
          },
          Right: &ast.IntLiteral{
            ValuePos: 18,
            ValueEnd: 19,
            Base:     10,
            Value:    "2",
          },
        },
      },
      &ast.ExprSelectItem{
        Expr: &ast.BinaryExpr{
          Op:   "*",

            ValueEnd: 29,

            ValuePos: 32,
            ValueEnd: 33,
            Base:     10,
            Value:    "2",

            ValuePos: 35,

            ValuePos: 39,
            ValueEnd: 40,
            Base:     10,
            Value:    "2",

          Op:   "+",

            Value:    "+1",

      &ast.ExprSelectItem{
        Expr: &ast.FloatLiteral{
          ValuePos: 76,
          ValueEnd: 80,
          Value:    "-3.4",
        },
      },
      &ast.ExprSelectItem{
        Expr: &ast.BinaryExpr{
          Op:   "^",
          Left: &ast.UnaryExpr{
            OpPos: 89,
            Op:    "~",
            Expr:  &ast.IntLiteral{
              ValuePos: 90,
              ValueEnd: 91,
              Base:     10,
              Value:    "1",
            },
          },
          Right: &ast.UnaryExpr{
            OpPos: 94,
            Op:    "~",
            Expr:  &ast.IntLiteral{
              ValuePos: 95,
              ValueEnd: 96,
              Base:     10,
              Value:    "1",

          },

      &ast.ExprSelectItem{
        Expr: &ast.BinaryExpr{
          Op:   "^",

            ValuePos: 105,
            ValueEnd: 106,
            Base:     10,
            Value:    "1",

          Right: &ast.IntLiteral{
            ValuePos: 109,

              Idents: []*ast.Ident{
                &ast.Ident{
                  NamePos: 156,
                  NameEnd: 159,
                  Name:    "foo",

                  NamePos: 160,
                  NameEnd: 163,

                    NamePos: 167,

                    NamePos: 171,

            OpPos: 177,
            Op:    "-",

              Idents: []*ast.Ident{
                &ast.Ident{
                  NamePos: 178,
                  NameEnd: 181,
                  Name:    "foo",
                },
                &ast.Ident{
                  NamePos: 182,
                  NameEnd: 185,
                  Name:    "bar",
                },
              },
            },
          },
        },
      },
      &ast.ExprSelectItem{
        Expr: &ast.SelectorExpr{
          Expr: &ast.ScalarSubQuery{
            Lparen: 194,
            Rparen: 207,
            Query:  &ast.Select{
              Select:   195,
              Distinct: false,
              AsStruct: false,
              Results:  []ast.SelectItem{
                &ast.Alias{
                  Expr: &ast.IntLiteral{
                    ValuePos: 202,
                    ValueEnd: 203,
                    Base:     10,
                    Value:    "1",
                  },
                  As: &ast.AsAlias{
                    As:    204,
                    Alias: &ast.Ident{
                      NamePos: 204,
                      NameEnd: 207,
                      Name:    "1",
                    },
                  },
                },
              },
              From:    (*ast.From)(nil),
              Where:   (*ast.Where)(nil),
              GroupBy: (*ast.GroupBy)(nil),
              Having:  (*ast.Having)(nil),
              OrderBy: (*ast.OrderBy)(nil),

            },
          },
          Ident: &ast.Ident{

            Name:    "1",

        Expr: &ast.UnaryExpr{

            Expr:  &ast.BoolLiteral{
              ValuePos: 227,
              Value:    true,
            },
          },

      &ast.ExprSelectItem{
        Expr: &ast.CaseExpr{
          Case:   330,
          EndPos: 403,
          Expr:   nil,
          Whens:  []*ast.CaseWhen{
            &ast.CaseWhen{
              When: 342,
              Cond: &ast.BinaryExpr{
                Op:   "=",

                  ValuePos: 347,
                  ValueEnd: 348,
                  Base:     10,
                  Value:    "1",

                Value:    "1 = 1",

            Else: 373,

              ValuePos: 389,

        },
      },
      &ast.ExprSelectItem{
        Expr: &ast.CaseExpr{
          Case:   415,
          EndPos: 502,
          Expr:   &ast.IntLiteral{
            ValuePos: 420,
            ValueEnd: 421,
            Base:     10,
            Value:    "1",
          },
          Whens: []*ast.CaseWhen{
            &ast.CaseWhen{
              When: 429,
              Cond: &ast.IntLiteral{
                ValuePos: 434,
                ValueEnd: 435,
                Base:     10,
                Value:    "1",
              },
              Then: &ast.StringLiteral{
                ValuePos: 441,
                ValueEnd: 444,
                Value:    "1",
              },

            &ast.CaseWhen{
              When: 452,
              Cond: &ast.IntLiteral{
                ValuePos: 457,

                ValuePos: 464,
                ValueEnd: 467,
                Value:    "2",

          },
          Else: &ast.CaseElse{
            Else: 475,
            Expr: &ast.StringLiteral{
              ValuePos: 487,
              ValueEnd: 494,
              Value:    "other",
            },
          },
        },
      },
      &ast.ExprSelectItem{
        Expr: &ast.BinaryExpr{
          Op:   "+",
          Left: &ast.IfExpr{
            If:     0,
            EndPos: 529,
            Expr:   &ast.BinaryExpr{
              Op:   "<",
              Left: &ast.IntLiteral{
                ValuePos: 517,
                ValueEnd: 518,
                Base:     10,
                Value:    "1",
              },
              Right: &ast.IntLiteral{
                ValuePos: 521,
                ValueEnd: 522,
                Base:     10,
                Value:    "2",
              },
            },
            TrueResult: &ast.IntLiteral{
              ValuePos: 524,
              ValueEnd: 525,
              Base:     10,
              Value:    "2",
            },
            FalseResult: &ast.IntLiteral{
              ValuePos: 527,
              ValueEnd: 528,
              Base:     10,
              Value:    "1",
            },
          },
          Right: &ast.IntLiteral{
            ValuePos: 530,
            ValueEnd: 531,
            Base:     10,
            Value:    "1",
          },
        },
      },
      &ast.ExprSelectItem{
        Expr: &ast.CallExpr{
          Rparen: 582,
          Func:   &ast.Ident{
            NamePos: 540,
            NameEnd: 548,
            Name:    "date_add",
          },
          Distinct: false,
          Args:     []*ast.Arg{
            &ast.Arg{
              Interval: -1,
              Expr:     &ast.DateLiteral{
                Date:  549,
                Value: &ast.StringLiteral{
                  ValuePos: 554,
                  ValueEnd: 566,
                  Value:    "2019-09-01",
                },
              },
              IntervalUnit: (*ast.Ident)(nil),
            },
            &ast.Arg{
              Interval: 568,
              Expr:     &ast.IntLiteral{
                ValuePos: 577,
                ValueEnd: 578,
                Base:     10,
                Value:    "5",
              },
              IntervalUnit: &ast.Ident{
                NamePos: 579,
                NameEnd: 582,
                Name:    "day",
              },
            },
          },
        },
      },
      &ast.ExprSelectItem{
        Expr: &ast.CallExpr{
          Rparen: 654,
          Func:   &ast.Ident{
            NamePos: 592,
            NameEnd: 605,
            Name:    "timestamp_add",
          },
          Distinct: false,
          Args:     []*ast.Arg{
            &ast.Arg{
              Interval: -1,
              Expr:     &ast.TimestampLiteral{
                Timestamp: 606,
                Value:     &ast.StringLiteral{
                  ValuePos: 616,
                  ValueEnd: 637,
                  Value:    "2019-09-01 08:11:22",
                },
              },
              IntervalUnit: (*ast.Ident)(nil),
            },
            &ast.Arg{
              Interval: 639,
              Expr:     &ast.IntLiteral{
                ValuePos: 648,
                ValueEnd: 649,
                Base:     10,
                Value:    "5",
              },
              IntervalUnit: &ast.Ident{
                NamePos: 650,
                NameEnd: 654,
                Name:    "hour",
              },
            },
          },
        },
      },
      &ast.ExprSelectItem{
        Expr: &ast.InExpr{
          Not:  false,
          Left: &ast.IntLiteral{
            ValuePos: 664,
            ValueEnd: 665,
            Base:     10,
            Value:    "1",
          },
          Right: &ast.ValuesInCondition{
            Lparen: 669,
            Rparen: 677,
            Exprs:  []ast.Expr{
              &ast.IntLiteral{
                ValuePos: 670,
                ValueEnd: 671,
                Base:     10,
                Value:    "1",
              },
              &ast.IntLiteral{
                ValuePos: 673,
                ValueEnd: 674,
                Base:     10,
                Value:    "2",
              },
              &ast.IntLiteral{
                ValuePos: 676,
                ValueEnd: 677,
                Base:     10,
                Value:    "3",
              },
            },
          },
        },
      },
      &ast.ExprSelectItem{
        Expr: &ast.InExpr{
          Not:  false,
          Left: &ast.IntLiteral{
            ValuePos: 687,
            ValueEnd: 688,
            Base:     10,
            Value:    "2",
          },
          Right: &ast.UnnestInCondition{
            Unnest: 692,
            Rparen: 708,
            Expr:   &ast.ArrayLiteral{
              Array:  0,
              Lbrack: 699,
              Rbrack: 707,
              Type:   nil,
              Values: []ast.Expr{
                &ast.IntLiteral{
                  ValuePos: 700,
                  ValueEnd: 701,
                  Base:     10,
                  Value:    "1",
                },
                &ast.IntLiteral{
                  ValuePos: 703,
                  ValueEnd: 704,
                  Base:     10,
                  Value:    "2",
                },
                &ast.IntLiteral{
                  ValuePos: 706,
                  ValueEnd: 707,
                  Base:     10,
                  Value:    "3",
                },
              },
            },
          },
        },
      },
      &ast.ExprSelectItem{
        Expr: &ast.InExpr{
          Not:  false,
          Left: &ast.IntLiteral{
            ValuePos: 718,
            ValueEnd: 719,
            Base:     10,
            Value:    "3",
          },
          Right: &ast.SubQueryInCondition{
            Lparen: 723,
            Rparen: 770,
            Query:  &ast.CompoundQuery{
              Op:       "UNION",
              Distinct: false,
              Queries:  []ast.QueryExpr{
                &ast.Select{
                  Select:   724,
                  Distinct: false,
                  AsStruct: false,
                  Results:  []ast.SelectItem{
                    &ast.ExprSelectItem{
                      Expr: &ast.IntLiteral{
                        ValuePos: 731,
                        ValueEnd: 732,
                        Base:     10,

                      },
                    },

                  From:    (*ast.From)(nil),

                &ast.Select{
                  Select:   762,
                  Distinct: false,
                  AsStruct: false,
                  Results:  []ast.SelectItem{
                    &ast.ExprSelectItem{

                        ValuePos: 769,
                        ValueEnd: 770,

                  OrderBy: (*ast.OrderBy)(nil),
                  Limit:   (*ast.Limit)(nil),
                },
              },
              OrderBy: (*ast.OrderBy)(nil),
              Limit:   (*ast.Limit)(nil),
            },
          },
        },
      },
      &ast.ExprSelectItem{
        Expr: &ast.BinaryExpr{
          Op:   "||",
          Left: &ast.ArrayLiteral{
            Array:  0,
            Lbrack: 780,
            Rbrack: 782,
            Type:   nil,
            Values: []ast.Expr{
              &ast.IntLiteral{
                ValuePos: 781,
                ValueEnd: 782,
                Base:     10,
                Value:    "1",
              },
            },
          },
          Right: &ast.ArrayLiteral{
            Array:  0,
            Lbrack: 787,
            Rbrack: 789,
            Type:   nil,
            Values: []ast.Expr{
              &ast.IntLiteral{
                ValuePos: 788,
                ValueEnd: 789,
                Base:     10,
                Value:    "2",
              },
            },
          },
        },
      },
    },
    From:    (*ast.From)(nil),
    Where:   (*ast.Where)(nil),
    GroupBy: (*ast.GroupBy)(nil),
    Having:  (*ast.Having)(nil),
    OrderBy: (*ast.OrderBy)(nil),
    Limit:   (*ast.Limit)(nil),
  },
}

--- SQL
SELECT 1 + 2, 1 - 2, 1 * 2, 2 / 2, +1 + +1, -1 + -1, +1.2, -3.4, ~1 ^ ~1, 1 ^ 2, 2 & 1, 2 | 1, 1 << 2, 2 >> 1, foo.bar * +foo.bar * -foo.bar, (SELECT 1 AS `1`).`1`, NOT NOT TRUE, ARRAY[1, 2, 3][OFFSET(1)], ARRAY[1, 2, 3][OFFSET(1)], ARRAY[1, 2, 3][ORDINAL(1)], CASE WHEN 1 = 1 THEN "1 = 1" ELSE "else" END, CASE 1 WHEN 1 THEN "1" WHEN 2 THEN "2" ELSE "other" END, IF(1 < 2,2,1) + 1, date_add(DATE "2019-09-01", INTERVAL 5 day), timestamp_add(TIMESTAMP "2019-09-01 08:11:22", INTERVAL 5 hour), 1 IN (1, 2, 3), 2 IN UNNEST(ARRAY[1, 2, 3]), 3 IN (SELECT 1 UNION ALL SELECT 2 UNION ALL SELECT 3), ARRAY[1] || ARRAY[2]
